issue.title: Python: Add pyarrow.schema.Schema.equals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add method in pyarrow to check if 2 schemas are equal.  This exists in Arrow-cpp, just need to call it from the python side.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-396?focusedCommentId=15709672) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
I can add this
